content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 3, Southampton 0.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 3, Southampton 0.
Attempt missed. Shane Long (Southampton) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Cédric Soares with a cross.
Aaron Cresswell (West Ham United) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by João Mário following a set piece situation.
Mark Noble (West Ham United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Sofiane Boufal (Southampton).
